mapper.select: select id,user_id,user_name,activity_id,competition_item_id,competition_type,create_time,apply_status,production_name,apply_group,apply_year_group,real_name,birthday,sex,school_name,class_company,recommened_company,card_type,card_number,telephone,mobile_phone,email,postcode,address,idea_desc,file_name,file_path,scriptwriter,director,camerist,editor,musician,artist,main_stuff,team_desc from user_completion_item_apply where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_completion_item_apply where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
